channel.title: CVE Feed for slirp -- libslirp
channel.description: The latest CVEs for slirp -- libslirp

item.title: CVE-2020-1983|2024-08-04T06:54:00.401Z -- slirp -- libslirp
item.description: A use after free vulnerability in ip_reass() in ip_input.c of libslirp 4.2.0 and prior releases allows crafted packets to cause a denial of service.
